title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 6 - SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR BUS DRIVERS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 6 - SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR BUS DRIVERS
State Regulations

General (§ 6.1 to 6.2)

Initial Employment Investigations and Inquiries for All Bus Drivers (§ 6.3 to 6.7)

Annual Procedures for Motor Carriers (§ 6.8 to 6.9)

Biennial Procedures for Motor Carriers (§ 6.10 to 6.12)

Examiners Certified by the Department of Motor Vehicles (§ 6.13)

Out-of-State Carriers (§ 6.14)

Miscellaneous Provisions (§ 6.15 to 6.26)

Disqualifications (§ 6.27 to 6.29)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 6

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§215, 509-a, 509-b, 509-d, 509-e, 509-g, 509-h, 509-j, 509-m

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
